ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: This study was supported by the Center for Research on Influenza Pathogenesis (HHSN272201400008C to A.F.-S. and A.G.-S.) and an NIAID-funded Center of Excellence for Influenza Research and Surveillance and partially supported by PRIME (Program for Research on Immune Modeling and Experimentation), an NIAID-funded Modeling Immunity for Biodefense Center (U19AI117873 to A.F.-S., A.G.-S., S.C.S., B.M.H., and I.R.).
We thank Juan Ayllon, Teresa Aydillo, Carles Martinez-Romero and Allison C. Lee for reagents and insightful discussions.
